high_descs: Move to the sink on your right.
Pick up the purple rag on the sink.
Bring the rag to the counter, right of the sink.
Put the rag on the counter, right of the sink.
anns.task_desc: Put a purple rag on the counter, right of the sink.

high_descs: Move right facing the grey sink on the bathroom counter
Pick up the purple towel in the sink
Move to the right side of the sink
Place the purple towel behind the roll of paper towels on the counter right of the sink
anns.task_desc: Move a towel to the bathroom counter top

high_descs: Take two steps forward, turn right to face the sink
pick up the purple rag that is in the sink
take a few steps to the right
put the purple rag on the counter
anns.task_desc: move the rag from the sink to the counter
